Beginning 2002 , 4,000 household interview every four month 3 year . The first two wave survey serve baseline . After second wave , household randomly assign one two group . Iron supplement provide member household assign one group . Household member 2nd group receive identical-looking placebo . Participants take supplement ( placebo ) weekly basis year .
